daily_plan_req: After visiting the gallery from 3:00 pm to 6:00 pm, he works remotely from a cafe or home.
name: Ethan Reed
learned: Ethan Reed majored in computer science, and he learned various computer languages during his undergraduate years. He has never won first place because he doesn't try hard compared to being smart.
currently: Ethan Reed is currently working as a developer for an IT company, and he doesn't listen to his boss. He wants AI technology to replace his work because he is lazy to code.
lifestyle: Ethan Reed wakes up at 2:00 pm and goes to bed around 5:00 am
